mapper.insert: insert into products_heart( heart_id, products_num, user_id, heart_date ) values ( products_heart_seq.nextval, #{productsNum}, #{userId}, sysdate )
mapper.delete: delete from products_heart where user_id = #{userId} and products_num = #{productsNum}
mapper.select: select prod.products_num, heart.user_id from products_heart heart inner join products prod on prod.products_num = heart.products_num and heart.USER_ID = #{getUserId}

select prod.products_num, prod.name, prod.state, heart.heart_date, heart.user_id from products_heart heart inner join products prod on prod.products_num = heart.products_num and heart.USER_ID = #{getUserId} order by prod.products_num
